title: Bug 49299 - Servlet 3.0 ch.7.1.1 misstates the effect of custom cookie name on URL rewriting
description: The bug report states that there is an incorrect statement in chapter 7.1.1 of the Servlet 3.0 specification regarding the effect of a custom cookie name on URL rewriting. Currently, the custom cookie name does not affect URL rewriting and the default "jsessionid" is used instead. The expected behavior is to follow the specification and have the custom cookie name affect URL rewriting.
OB: Currently, when accessing http://localhost:8080/cookiename/, the URL is rewriting using the default "jsessionid" cookie instead of the custom cookie name.
EB: Expected result: when accessing http://localhost:8080/cookiename/, the URL should be rewritten as http://localhost:8080/cookiename/index.jsp;MYSESSIONCOOKIE=658C60E714E9C7C833F4FDA366E0477F
SR:
Steps to reproduce:
1. Deploy the attached war file 'cookiename.war'
2. Access http://localhost:8080/cookiename/
